channel.title: [317] Client Compile Help! *PLEASE READ* [317]
channel.description:
Ok soo... recently ive never had this error. but.. anyways... i went to chaneg the ip for my client ( In 317's) And i got this error: Take a look:
[img]http://i958.photobucket.com/albums/ae65/Rigsy_2010/Untitled-4.png[/img]
All my paths are correct and everything. My path is set to my Java JDK path.
Heres my compiling text code In edit
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
If anyone could please help!!! Please reply and help if you can

item.title: [317] Client Compile Help! *PLEASE READ* [317]
item.dc:creator: @fuckedup111 fuckedup111
item.description:
@fuckedup111 wrote:

Try this one

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Client Compile Help! *PLEASE READ* [317]
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling...
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Replace your whole compiler code with that

Read full topic
